info.title: Enershare - REC Operation and LEM pricing API
info.description: A REST API designed to calculate the prices in a Local Energy Market (LEM) and to determine the operational schedule of Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) assets within a Renewable Energy Community (REC).

post.description:
Calculate an array of LEM prices using the selected pricing mechanism.
No Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) is solved. The LEM offers are formulated solely on the basis of the meters’ historical or projected net consumption and their corresponding opportunity costs

get.description: An endpoint for fetching the results of a "vanilla" request, given the order ID.

202.description: Order found but not yet processed.

412.description: One or more meter IDs not found.

422.description: One or more data points for one or more meter IDs not found.

tags: Schedule operation and calculate LEM Prices
post.description:
Calculate an array of LEM prices and the operational schedule of the BESS assets by executing a purely collective MILP.
In this process, the shadow prices of a LEM equilibrium constraint are returned as the optimal LEM prices.

tags: Schedule operation and calculate LEM Prices
post.description:
Calculate an array of LEM prices and the operational schedule of the BESS assets by implementing an iterative algorithm.
In this process, successive two-stage MILP are solved until a specified stopping criterion is achieved. Each two-stage MILP procedure is executed with LEM prices that are calculated based on the user-defined pricing mechanism. The offers are formulated based on the net loads that result from the previously solved MILP.

get.description: An endpoint for fetching the results of a request that involves solving one or several MILP, given the order ID.

202.description: Order found but not yet processed.

412.description: One or more meter IDs not found.

422.description: One or more data point for one or more meter IDs not found.

get.description: An endpoint for fetching the results of a request that involves solving one or several MILP, given the order ID.

202.description: Order found but not yet processed.

412.description: One or more meter IDs not found.

422.description: One or more data point for one or more meter IDs not found.

get.description: An endpoint for fetching the results of a request that involves solving one or several MILP, given the order ID.

202.description: Order found but not yet processed.

412.description: One or more meter IDs not found.

422.description: One or more data point for one or more meter IDs not found.

message.title: Message
examples: Processing has started. Use the order ID for status updates.

order_id.title: Order Id
order_id.description:
Order identifier for the request.
Request results via REST API can only be retrieved by specifying this identifier.

start_datetime.title: Start Datetime
start_datetime.description: Start datetime for the price calculation horizon (included in it) in ISO 8601 format.

end_datetime.title: End Datetime
end_datetime.description: End datetime for the price calculation horizon (included in it) in ISO 8601 format.

dataset_origin.description:
Dataset origin from which the meter IDs' data is to be retrieved from. Two options are provided:
 - SEL (Smart Energy Lab)
 - CEVE (Cooperativa Elétrica Vale d'Este

meter_ids.title: Meter Ids
meter_ids.description:
An array of strings that unequivocally identifies the meters to be included in the REC.
All registered assets (i.e., meter ids) belonging totally or partially to the meters listed, will be considered in the following computations.

provider_meter_id.title: Provider Meter Id
provider_meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies the providing meter of the REC.

receiver_meter_id.title: Receiver Meter Id
receiver_meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies the receiving meter of the REC.

energy.title: Energy
energy.description: Energy transacted in the local energy market (LEM), in kWh.

objective_value.title: Objective Value
objective_value.description: Objective value found for the MILP solution.

milp_status.description: Indicates if the MILP was optimally solved (by returning "Optimal") or if an issue was raised and a successful solution was not achieved (by returning "Infeasible" or "Unbounded").

total_rec_cost.title: Total Rec Cost
total_rec_cost.description: Total operation cost for the whole community, in €.

individual_costs.title: Individual Costs
individual_costs.description: Individual operation cost per meter ID, in €.

meter_inputs.title: Meter Inputs
meter_inputs.description: All time-varying inputs that were fed into the MILP, per meter ID.

meter_outputs.title: Meter Outputs
meter_outputs.description: Time-varying outputs calculated in the MILP, per meter ID.

lem_transactions.title: Lem Transactions
lem_transactions.description: List with energies bought and sold in the LEM, per pair of meter IDs and per datetime.

lem_prices.title: Lem Prices
lem_prices.description: List with the local energy market prices computed for the requested horizon.

self_consumption_tariffs.title: Self Consumption Tariffs
self_consumption_tariffs.description: List with the self-consumption tariffs considered by the MILP, per pair of meter IDs.

provider_meter_id.title: Provider Meter Id
provider_meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies the providing meter of the REC.

receiver_meter_id.title: Receiver Meter Id
receiver_meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies the receiving meter of the REC.

self_consumption_tariff.title: Self Consumption Tariff
self_consumption_tariff.description: Tariff applicable to self-consumed energy from the public grid, published by the national regulatory entity for energy services, in €/kWh. This tariff is payable by the receiving_member_id when purchasing energy in the LEM from the provider_member_id.

meter_id.title: Meter Id
meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies a meter of the REC.

individual_cost.title: Individual Cost
individual_cost.description: The operation cost for the optimization horizon calculated for the meter ID, without considering the cost for degradation of the BESS, in €.

meter_id.title: Meter Id
meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies a meter of the REC.

energy_generated.title: Energy Generated
energy_generated.description: PV panels’ generation considered by the algorithm, in kWh.

energy_consumed.title: Energy Consumed
energy_consumed.description: Meter's consumption considered by the algorithm, in kWh.

buy_tariff.title: Buy Tariff
buy_tariff.description: Purchase rate agreed with the retailer that was considered by the algorithm, in €/kWh.

sell_tariff.title: Sell Tariff
sell_tariff.description: Selling rate agreed with the retailer that was considered by the algorithm, in €/kWh.

value.title: Value
value.description: Local energy market price computed, in €/kWh.

message.title: Message
examples: One or more meter IDs not found on registry system.

missing_ids.title: Missing Ids
missing_ids.description: List with meter IDs missing from the registry system.

meter_id.title: Meter Id
meter_id.description: The string that unequivocally identifies the meter of the REC that made the offer.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount offered in the session, in kWh.

value.title: Value
value.description: Price offered in the session, in €/kwh.

type.description: Indicates if it is a buying or selling offer.

message.title: Message
examples: Order found, but not yet processed. Please try again later.

meter_id.title: Meter Id
meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies a meter of the REC.

energy_surplus.title: Energy Surplus
energy_surplus.description: Energy surplus that was sold to the retailer, in kWh.

energy_supplied.title: Energy Supplied
energy_supplied.description: Energy supplied that was bought from the retailer, in kWh.

net_load.title: Net Load
net_load.description: Expected net load registered in the meter, in kWh.

bess_energy_charged.title: Bess Energy Charged
bess_energy_charged.description:
Energy charged in the meter's BESS, in kWh.
Sent as 0.0 if the meter does not have storage.

bess_energy_discharged.title: Bess Energy Discharged
bess_energy_discharged.description:
Energy discharged in the meter's BESS, in kWh.
Sent as 0.0 if the meter does not have storage.

bess_energy_content.title: Bess Energy Content
bess_energy_content.description:
Energy content of the meter's BESS, at the end of the time interval, in kWh.
Sent as 0.0 if the meter does not have storage.

meter_id.title: Meter Id
meter_id.description: A string that unequivocally identifies a meter of the REC.

energy_purchased_lem.title: Energy Purchased Lem
energy_purchased_lem.description: Energy that was purchased in the local energy market (LEM), in kWh.

energy_sold_lem.title: Energy Sold Lem
energy_sold_lem.description: Energy that was sold in the local energy market (LEM), in kWh.

sold_position.title: Sold Position
sold_position.description: Sold position of the meter ID, for the datetime, calculated as the energy sold minus the energy bought in the LEM, in kWh.

objective_value.title: Objective Value
objective_value.description: Objective value found for the MILP solution.

milp_status.description: Indicates if the MILP was optimally solved (by returning "Optimal") or if an issue was raised and a successful solution was not achieved (by returning "Infeasible" or "Unbounded").

total_rec_cost.title: Total Rec Cost
total_rec_cost.description: Total operation cost for the whole community, in €.

individual_costs.title: Individual Costs
individual_costs.description: Individual operation cost per meter ID, in €.

meter_inputs.title: Meter Inputs
meter_inputs.description: All time-varying inputs that were fed into the MILP, per meter ID.

meter_outputs.title: Meter Outputs
meter_outputs.description: Time-varying outputs calculated in the MILP, per meter ID.

lem_transactions.title: Lem Transactions
lem_transactions.description: List with total energies bought and sold in the LEM, per meter ID and per datetime.

lem_prices.title: Lem Prices
lem_prices.description: List with the local energy market prices computed for the requested horizon.

self_consumption_tariffs.title: Self Consumption Tariffs
self_consumption_tariffs.description: List with the self-consumption tariffs considered by the MILP.

self_consumption_tariff.title: Self Consumption Tariff
self_consumption_tariff.description: Tariff applicable to self-consumed energy from the public grid, published by the national regulatory entity for energy services, in €/kWh.

message.title: Message
examples: One or more data point for one or more meter IDs not found on registry system.

missing_data_points.title: Missing Data Points
missing_data_points.description: Lists of missing data points' datetime per meter ID.

start_datetime.title: Start Datetime
start_datetime.description: Start datetime for the price calculation horizon (included in it) in ISO 8601 format.

end_datetime.title: End Datetime
end_datetime.description: End datetime for the price calculation horizon (included in it) in ISO 8601 format.

dataset_origin.description:
Dataset origin from which the meter IDs' data is to be retrieved from. Two options are provided:
 - SEL (Smart Energy Lab)
 - CEVE (Cooperativa Elétrica Vale d'Este

meter_ids.title: Meter Ids
meter_ids.description:
An array of strings that unequivocally identifies the meters to be included in the REC.
All registered assets (i.e., meter ids) belonging totally or partially to the meters listed, will be considered in the following computations.

sdr_compensation.title: Sdr Compensation
sdr_compensation.description:
Only considered when choosing "sdr" as the pricing mechanism.
Defines a compensation between 0.0 and 1.0 allowing the user to set an incentive for internal trades whenever the REC has a net surplus.

mmr_divisor.title: Mmr Divisor
mmr_divisor.description:
Only considered when choosing "mmr" as the pricing mechanism.
Defines the divisor considered on the MMR expression. Values greater than 2 will favor buyers and values smaller than 2 will favor sellers.

lem_prices.title: Lem Prices
lem_prices.description: List with the local energy market prices computed for the requested horizon.

offers.title: Offers
offers.description: A description of all the offers considered in the local energy market session that resulted in the calculated price.
